name: Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat Relief Drops, Sore Throat Lozenges, Sore Throat Medicine with Hexylresorcinol, Cough Drops Alternative, Honey & Echinacea Flavor Medicated Numbing Throat Drops, 40 ct
short_description: MUCINEX SORE THROAT RELIEF: These sore throat drops provide soothing comfort and temporarily relieve occasional minor irritation and pain associated with sore throat, sore mouth, and canker sores
FAST ACTING SORE THROAT LOZENGES: Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat Drops provide rapid relief that lasts up to 2 hours

HONEY & ECHINACEA FLAVOR SORE THROAT DROPS: These echinacea & honey flavored sore throat medicated drops are powered by a unique formula containing hexylresorcinol, not menthol like other cough drops; Use as directed
ON-THE-GO SORE THROAT RELIEF: Each Mucinex sore throat drop is individually wrapped & sealed for your convenience, so you don't have to worry about them unwrapping & sticking in your pocket or bag

BE PREPARED FOR COLD & FLU SEASON: Mucinex has a wide range of cough, cold and flu health care products to help your family get through cold & flu season, such as cough drops, sore throat spray, cold medicine, and cough medicine
product_description: Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat + Soothing Comfort medicated throat drops have a powerful 3 in 1 formula that relieves, soothes, and numbs sore throats. These honey & echinacea flavored sore throat lozenges provide rapid relief that lasts up to 2 hours. The active ingredient Hexylresorcinol, an oral pain reliever, provides powerful sore throat relief without menthol. Each medicated drop has less than 10 calories and 2.5g of sugar (no artificial sweeteners here!). Adults and children 6 years of age and over: allow one lozenge to dissolve slowly in the mouth; may be repeated every 2 hours as needed or directed by a doctor or dentist. Children under 6 years of age: do not use. Looking for Mucinex cough drops? Try our Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat + Cough Relief Alpine Herbs & Mint flavor medicated drops. For sore throat spray, try Mucinex Instasoothe Kickstart Sore Throat Winterfresh Flavor Spray. Look for Mucinex Fast-Max for cough & cold medicine to help get you through cold and flu season.

COLD & FLU SYMPTOM RELIEF: For cough and throat irritation throughout the cold season, Ricola MAX Throat Care Honey Lemon Drops with Extra Menthol deliver maximum cooling comfort when environmental allergens, indoor heat, cold & flu symptoms, and dry air cause throat discomfort

Each drop delivers extra menthol, almost twice the menthol in Ricola Original Herb Throat Drops, to suppress coughs and soothe throat irritation. Ricola MAX Throat Care helps ease throat irritation, discomfort, and dryness to help you speak more comfortably. Made with Ricola's signature Swiss Alpine herb blend and a liquid center with extra menthol, these herbal throat lozenges combine the naturally refreshing flavor of real lemon concentrate with effective relief from cold and flu symptoms. Whether you're battling a cough or sore throat, Ricola MAX Throat Care Honey Lemon delivers cooling, menthol relief you can count on. Stock up for home, work, and travel so soothing relief is always within reach.

short_description: SOOTHING HONEY-BASED COUGH RELIEF – Honees Honey Cough Suppressant Drops provide natural, temporary relief from coughs due to colds while soothing sore throats and cooling nasal passages.
TIME-HONORED HONEY REMEDY – Each drop contains pure liquid honey, a proven, natural alternative to over-the-counter cough suppressants, delivering effective, comforting relief anytime you need it.
ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS & PURE FORMULA – Made without preservatives, artificial colors, or flavors, Honees drops are GMO-free and gluten-free, delivering peace of mind with every use.

POCKET-SIZED RELIEF ON THE GO – Includes a bundle of 6 bars, each containing 9 drops, for a total of 54 drops. These compact, travel-friendly bars are perfect for slipping into your pocket or bag, delivering soothing relief for coughs and sore throats anytime, anywhere.
BELOVED ORIGINAL SINCE THE 1960s – The Honees Honey drop that started it all! This classic formula remains a favorite for soothing relief and delicious taste, trusted by families for decades.
product_description: Discover the natural comfort of HONEES Honey Filled Drops, your go-to remedy for soothing sore throats and easing coughs caused by colds. Each drop is filled with pure liquid honey, a time-honored ingredient known for its natural, soothing properties. HONEES delivers effective relief while cooling nasal passages and coating irritated throats, offering a trusted alternative to synthetic over-the-counter cough suppressants. Crafted with care, these drops are made with all-natural ingredients, free from preservatives, artificial colors, or flavors. GMO-free and gluten-free, they provide peace of mind with every use, making them perfect for health-conscious families seeking a pure, effective remedy. This bundle includes 24 compact bars, each containing 9 individually wrapped drops, for a total of 216 drops. Designed for convenience, these travel-friendly bars fit easily into your pocket or bag, ensuring soothing relief is always within reach, whether at home, work, or on the go. Explore your favorite flavors, including Honey, Menthol Eucalyptus, Menthol Lemon, or an Assorted Pack. With multiple pack sizes available, it’s easy to save and stock up, ensuring you’re prepared with natural throat-soothing care whenever you need it.
